bSSTSx-w6.memHandModelNotes: Brackish/Salt water type was selected for this species, but since no water buffers are selected, the salinity is not affected. Map units alone serve to limit this species' model to Brackish/Salt water habitats.  I therefore un-selected water type from the drop-down menu above. MJR 29aug07.
